question: You work for an international company and would like to spend six months working in its head office in another country.Write a letter to your manager, in your letter.1/ explain why you want to work in the company’s head office for six months 2/ say how your work could be done while you are away 3/ ask for his/her help in arranging it.
text: I take this opportunity to inform you that since our sales have drastically decreased in the Australian market, and additionally with the limited staff there, I understand their frustration in running the business with the current situation.

Therefore, I would like to suggest that I make a visit to the market and support the team there for the next six months. During my ,stay the local team and I can seek  new business opportunities as well as develop new campaigns and launch one at the same time, with this rest assured we can increase our sales.

In the course of my absence, I will brief my assistant to manage my work, and share the daily work plan. If any urgent matter arises, anyone can directly contact me via Whatsapp where I'll be able to respond immediately.
However, I would greatly appreciate your support in guiding my assistant and your consideration in this regard.
